title: Blended Learning-Based Communication Skills Enhancement Program for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and patient interaction experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning model combining real-time video lectures and asynchronous learning activities conducted in a limited technological environment centered around smartphones, with a focus on summative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three context-specific conversation techniques for effective communication with patients and caregivers.
Learners enhance constructive communication skills by providing peer feedback at least three times on online discussion platforms.
Learners execute conflict management strategies with over 80% accuracy through role-play simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
